title: Ashley Benson keeps it simple in all-black outfit with short skirt at Girl Up event in Beverly Hills
text:
Ashley Benson wore an all-black outfit Sunday to the Girl Up #GirlHero Awards on Sunday in Beverly Hills, California.

The 29-year-old actress was supporting her girlfriend Cara Delevingne, 27, who was being honored at the event held at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel.

Ashley showed her lean legs in the long-sleeved outfit that featured a short skirt.

Lady in black: Ashley Benson wore an all-black outfit Sunday while attending the Girl Up #GirlHero Awards in Beverly Hills, California

She had her brown hair straight down in loose curls with a black ribbon in the back.

English model-turned-actress Cara was being honored at the second annual awards event along with Kate Hudson, 40, and British actress Jameela Jamil, 33, for their commitment to gender equality.

Girl Up is a global leadership development initiative, positioning girls to be leaders in the movement for gender equality and was founded by the United Nations Foundation in 2010.

Cara in June confirmed that she has been dating Ashley for a year.

Cute smile: The 29-year-old actress flashed her cute smile upon arrival at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel

Short skirt: The Pretty Little Liars star showed her lean legs with a short skirt

Showing support: Ashley was supporting her girlfriend Cara Delevingne who was being honored with an award at the event

She made the admission while opening up about their relationship at the TrevorLIVE New York Gala in New York City.

Cara explained to E! News that she was inspired to go public with their romance because of the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall Riots and Pride because it was her 'one year anniversary' with Ashley.

Ashley and Cara were spotted last month together watching the women's final at the US Open in New York.

Going strong: The actresses have been dating for about 16 months

Sports fans: Cara and Ashley are shown last month at the US Open in New York City

Ashley is best known for her portrayal of Hanna Marin on Pretty Little Liars from 2010 to 2017.

Cara and Ashley co-starred in the 2018 drama Her Smell that also featured Elisabeth Moss, Virginia Madsen and Amber Heard.

Her Smell premiered in September 2018 at the Toronto International Film Festival and was released in April.
description: The 29-year-old actress wore an all-black outfit Sunday to the Girl Up #Girl Hero Awards on Sunday in Beverly Hills, California.
